posts.post_content:
Turns any creature into a [Prized Unicorn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Prized Unicorn). For the same cost as PU, and it's unexpected. I don't see why this is rated so low. Could also be read as 'All but one of your creatures are unblockable this turn.' Doesn't seem so overcosted then, does it?   
  
(and shush up about [Palace Guard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Palace Guard). He knows he's awesome without you bragging about him.)

posts.post_content: Why is this rated so low? I used two of these to decimate my opponents in the mid game by locking his walls and creatures onto an expendable which had death touch. Killed his critters and gave 8 damage. Twice. Can't be countered as easily or expected as a prized unicorn.
